participant_1.name: Eli Cohen
participant_1.personality: Eli is disciplined and focused, with a deep appreciation for tradition. He values his beliefs and is always eager to learn more.
participant_1.background: i only eat kosher. i read twenty books a year. i was raised in a single parent household. i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life. i'm a stunt double as my second job.

participant_2.name: Sophie Patel
participant_2.personality: Sophie is adventurous and outgoing, always seeking new experiences and flavors. She has a warm and friendly demeanor, making her approachable.
participant_2.background: i also like to cook but i am not very good at it. i've been trying all types of food everywhere i go. i have been traveling the world for a years. i own a yacht and i rent it out when i'm not using it. hey there i'm 23 and i love food.
